segments.text: I notice the water flowing over the edge of the sink, creating a puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman doesn't seem to notice it at all, which is really surprising.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just standing there, drying that plate like nothing is happening, it's almost funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit frustrated watching her ignore the mess, she should really pay more attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so quiet, trying to get those cookies without her noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching to reach the jar, standing on that unstable stool, it's not safe at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself, that would be terrible and I would feel awful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is being so patient, waiting for her turn to get a cookie, she's so well-behaved.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what will happen if the woman suddenly turns around and sees them, they might get in trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the calm garden and the chaotic kitchen is quite striking, it's almost like two different worlds.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a bit amused by the whole situation, it's almost like a scene from a comedy.
segments.speaker: PAR
